Imports

../core/all, ../types/colorstring

Types

Rx = object
  case kind*: RxKind
  of rxkText:
      text*: string

  of rxkSpecial:
      special*: RxSpecialKind

  of rxkCharSet:
      charElems: seq[RxSetElem]

  of rxkSingleArgKinds, rxkRepeatedArgKinds:
      args: seq[Rx]
      repeatMin*, repeatMax*: int
  Source   Edit 
RxFlavor = enum
  rxfEmacs, rxfPerl, rxfDebug, rxfLisp, rxfPosix, rxfExtendedPosix
  Source   Edit 
RxKind = enum
  rxkText, rxkCharset, rxkSpecial, rxkOneOrMoreGreedy, rxkOneOrMoreLazy,
  rxkZeroOrMoreGreedy, rxkZeroOrMoreLazy, rxkOptional, rxkAlt, rxkConcat,
  rxkGroup, rxkNonCapturingGroup, rxkRepeatNTimes, rxkRepeatNtoMTimes
  Source   Edit 
RxSetElem = object
  case kind*: RxSetElemKind
  of rseItem:
      item: char

  of rseRange:
      start, finish: char
  Source   Edit 
RxSetElemKind = enum
  rseItem, rseRange
  Source   Edit 
RxSpecialKind = enum
  rskLineStart, rskLineEnd, rskStringStart, rskStringEnd, rskStringBoundary,
  rskStringOrLineEnd, rskWord, rskNotWord, rskSpace, rskNotSpace, rskDigit,
  rskNotDigit, rskAny
  Source   Edit

                     rxkRepeatNtoMTimes}
